testcase.description:
Certain axes in the US GAAP taxonomy should only have certain members as shown in the US GAAP taxonomy. This rule tests whether these axes have inappropriate members 

Certain axes can have custom or extended (i.e., company specific) members. This rule also tests whether only these axes have custom members and, therefore, limits the use of custom or extended members to those situations where they are appropriate because the member is unique to the filer. 

The rule evaluates a companyâ€™s extension taxonomy and instance document and flags an error when there is an inappropriate axis/member combination in the extension taxonomy even though there is no fact associated with the axis/member combination in the instance document.
testcase.ruleMessage: The member, ${Rule.member.label}, associated with the axis, FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis and element ${fact1.label}, is not an appropriate Axis/Member combination. \n

variation.name: Creates a fail when the RangeAxis is used with a member that is not defined on an the same axis in the taxonomy or an approved extension.
variation.description: Creates 12 fail cases when the members Year2Member through Year5Member is used with the 12 facts on the RangeAxis.

result.message:
The member, ${Rule.member.label} is used on the axis ${Rule.axis.label} with the element ${fact1.label} with a value of 3 . This member should not be used with the ${Rule.axis.label].

variation.name: Creates a fail case when the CurrencyAxis is used with a member that is not a member child of the CurrencyAxis or an allowable extension.
variation.description: Creates a fail case when the EuropeMember is used on the CurrencyAxis instead of EUR.

result.message:
The member, ${Rule.member.label} is used on the axis ${Rule.axis.label} with the element ${fact1.label} with a value of 600000000 . This member should not be used with the ${Rule.axis.label].

The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentFaceAmount fact are:
Period: 2015-04-05
Dimensions: DebtInstrumentAxis = OneTwentyFivePercentNotesDueTwentyTwentyFiveMember; CurrencyAxis = EuropeMember
Unit: EUR
Rule version: ${ruleVersion}

variation.name: Creates a pass case when the CurrencyAxis is used with a member that is a member child of the CurrencyAxis or is an allowable extension.
variation.description: Creates a pass case when the member OtherCurrencyMember is used on the CurrencyAxis

variation.name: Creates a fail case when the PositionAxis is used with a member that is not a member child of the PositionAxis or an allowable extension.
variation.description: Creates 1 fail case when the member AmendedReturnsMember is used on the Position Axis.
